name: Math Contest -Mathematics Game
description: Math Contest - Mathematics Game is a mental calculation game to improve your math skills. A single or 2 players math game to train your brain !  The game is designed for children and adults and allows to train to mental calculation.  - 200 levels to practice math - 5 seconds and 2 answers for each mathematics question - 3 lives - Discover the many colorful themes - Reach the top of world ranking - Compare your score with your friends - Unlock achievements  2 players mode Who is the best in mathematics and mental calculation ? Challenge your friends with the 2 players mode ! On the same device, play together with the split screen. - Choose the number of calculations, 10, 20 or 50  - 3 difficulty levels - Addition and/or Multiplication  Be quick to triumph +1 point for a good answer -2 points for a wrong answer  Try Math Contest - Mathematics Game to train yourself and improve your mathematics skills !
